page.title: 04TRADE IN BURY AREA
page.content: Trade In Bury Area. The three main centres of trade in the Bury area are Bury Stores,the Post Office and Burtons garage. The Post Office is situated on the out_skirts of Bury between two estates.The Post Office also has a small shop which sells every day things. Bury Stores is on a corner near two estates.Although the shop is not very big senior citizens could easily do their weekly shopping there. Burtons garage is also situated on a corner which helps attract passers by.Aswe well as the forecourt,showroom and repair platform there is a small shop which sells groceries as well as car equipment. All shops state that their trade is 50% iocal and 50% passing trade.
